text: Era twabawa obunnyonnyofu bwe kigambo (ekikwata ku kutumwa kwa Nabbi Muhammad) olwo nno tebayawukana okugyako luvannyuma lwa kumanya kubajjira (nga ekyo baakikola) olwo bukyayi obwali wakati waabwe, mazima Mukama omulabirizi wo agenda kulamula wakati waabwe ku lunaku lwâ€™enkomerero mwebyo bye bayawukanangamu
